translations: v.（使）窘迫，混乱（discombobulate 的过去式及过去分词）

phrs.translation: 扰乱的, 使混乱的, 打乱的

sentences.sentence: I can also see why you're discombobulated by their sympathy.
sentences.translation: 我也能理解为何他们的同情令你惶惶不安。

sentences.sentence: I can also see why you're discombobulated by their sympathy.
sentences.translation: 我也能明确为何他们的怜悯令你惶惑不安。
